modkit.protocol.outdated.remote:
§4Outdated ModKit Protocol on Client: %s
§7(The server wants: %s§7, you should update your modloader)
modkit.protocol.outdated.local:
§4Outdated ModKit Protocol on Server: %s
§7(The client wants: %s§7, you should downgrade your client)
modkit.loader.outdated.remote:
§cOutdated Modloader Version on Client: %s
§7(The server wants: %s§7, you should update your modloader)
modkit.loader.outdated.local:
§cOutdated Modloader Version on Server: %s
§7(The client wants: %s§7, you should downgrade your client)
modkit.missingmodded.server:
§4Cannot join non-cyan server because some local mods
require server mods to be installed.
modkit.missingmods.both:
§cMissing Required Mods

§5Missing Client Mods:
%s

§5Missing Server Mods:
%s
cyan.dump.message.error: §6Cannot dump backtrace as another dump is in progress.
cyan.dump.message.error.existing: §6Cannot dump backtrace as another dump has already been saved.
cyan.dump.message2: §bDump has been created on the server, §6please remember that you are not allowed to distribute the dump.
cyan.dump.error: §bAn error occured on the server, Exception: %s

§5Server Modloader Version: §6%s
§5Game Version: §6%s
§5Server Mods: §6%s
§5Client Mods: §6%s
